locations.name: Atlanta
locations.org: Caring Hands Food Pantry at Allen Temple AME Church-Atlanta
locations.address: 1625 Joseph E Boone Blvd NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30314
locations.description:
AD Powell Fellowship Hall
**Caring Hands Food Pantry** is an outreach ministry of Allen Temple AME Church. We provide a vaiety of food to include fresh vegetables, meat, bread, gluten-free and and vegan items as well as non-perishable packs for those who have limited access to refrigeration. We also have a clothing closet. 
All are welcomed and you may just find a **new family. **
**REQUIREMENTS**
* Identification
* Initial Application 
* Sign-in weekly with personal barcode
* Respect Volunteers
...and...visit us sometime on Sunday at 10:30 a.m. for worship service
{Please arrive within the first 10 minutes of the start time to receive a bag of free produce every wednesday .
No registration is required. Mask-wearing is optional and based on your comfort level.https://extension.uga.edu/county-offices/fulton/fulton-fresh/mobile-market.html}
